item.description:
This is the presentation of a check for $2,500 to the Table.  It is all of the proceeds from our recent yard sale.

We will be riding to Brockton to The Table at the Mainspring House where we will present the director with a check and have some pictures taken.   We need to arrive on our bikes by 930 am.  (pray for nice weather!)

Everyone is invited and I hope that many of you can attend so we have a good representation of the club.

Kathy will give us a tour of the facility following the presentation of the check.  Then we can ride somewhere to lunch.

Everyone should be very proud of what we accomplished....from lugging stuff to Sheila's house, to setting up and breaking down, and having fun haggling with the buyers.  It was a fun and profitable day for a good cause.

If anyone prefers to meet us at the Table the address is 54 N. Main St in Brockton.  Please rsvp with a comment that you will meet us there.

 

Meeting location:  Panera Bread- Hingham Derby Shops

Meeting time:  8:15 am - Kickstands up promptly at 845 am

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Check Presentation to the Table at Father Bills And Mainspring House
